artist: Designer: Hans J. Holzer; Manufacturer: Heal's Fabrics
description: 4-1/2 repeats; symmetrical forms blue, purple, violet, turquoise on white bkg.
image_copyright: © Heal%27s Fabrics%2C London%2C Hans J. Holzer%2C 1975
markings: \'<- TOP WOVEN & PRINTED IN ENGLAND SHRINK RESISTING <- TOP\', \'TOP -> HEALS STRATA DESIGNED BY HANS J HOLZER\', printed in white border to either side
text: This textile, with its iris reference, was created as a dramatic, abstract, repeating design that could be framed and used as a wall hanging or used as a dominating element in an interior environment
title: Strata
